what: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: Programming clinical trial data analysis tends standardized. data standards CDISC, expectations tend clearly defined. Within programming activities, ’s ample room use metadata. Metadata can used several different purposes, applying dataset attributes, establishing sort sequences, working controlled terminology, . Despite CDISC standards, organizations tend means storing metadata, excel spreadsheets, databases, . purpose metacore establish common foundation use metadata within R session. done creating R object can hold necessary data standardized, immutable structure (using R6) makes easy extract necessary information needed. Users can read metadata various sources. make easy, ’ve provided helper functions - even readers can read directly Define.xml 2.0. establishing common consistent object memory, packages support work flows can common foundation upon tools can built leverage metadata future. reduces need hold different data structures containing metadata instead allows programs pull information centralized source.

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: can install current development version metacore github :

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: metacore object made-6 different tables, connected series identifying columns. goal tables normalize information much possible, keeping together like information. table basic theme make easier remember. follows: ds_spec: Contains dataset level information ds_vars: Bridges dataset variable level information var_spec: Contains variable level information value_spec: Contains value level information derivations: Contains derivations codelist: Contains information code/decodes, permitted values external libraries supp: Contains information specific supplemental variables schema fits together: Schema diagram showing relationships metacore tables (variable names included)

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table covers basic information dataset. single row per dataset, following information: dataset: abbreviated name dataset (e.g. AE) structure: Value structure dataset sting label: Dataset label

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table contains information bridges purely dataset level purely variable level. one row per dataset per variable: dataset: abbreviated name dataset. match name ds_spec variable: Variable name key_seq: Sequence key, variables used order dataset. column integers, 1 first sorting variable 2 second etc. variable used sorting left NA order: Order sets order columns appear dataset. also numeric value keep: Logical value variable needs kept core: ADaM core, one following values: “Expected”, “Required”, “Permissible”, “Conditionally Required”, “Conditionally Expected”, NA. information core see CDISC supp_flag: Logical determine variable supplemental datasets

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table contains purely variable level information. goal single row per variable, common across datasets. helps ensure variables follow CDISC standard. , isn’t always possible, information given variable differs across datasets, variable recorded dataset.variable variable column. variable: Variable name, match name ds_spec. Unless variable needs duplicated, name combination dataset name variable name ds_spec (dataset.variable) type: Variable class length: Variable length (relevant R datasets, important creating XPT files) label: Variable label common: Common across ADaM datasets format: Variable format

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table contains information information value level. least one row per dataset/variable combination. one row per dataset/variable combination combination values differing metadata. instance LBORRES different data types depending value. information contained follows: dataset: abbreviated name dataset. match name ds_spec variable: Variable name. match name ds_vars type: String value type origin: Origin value sig_dig: Significant digits value code_id: ID code list match id codelist table : Value variable derivation_id: ID derivation match derivation table

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table derivation information, one row per derivation ID following information: derivation_id: ID, match value_spec derivation: Text describing derivation

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table contains code lists, permitted value lists, external libraries nested within tibble. single row per list/library, following information: code_id: ID used identify code list. code_id val_spec name: Name code list code: list tibbles (code / decode combinations) vectors (permitted values libraries), contain codes type: indicator information code column code/decode table, permitted value, external library

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: table contains information needed create supplemental tables. want add variable go supplemental qualifier can create normal (.e. label information going var_spec table derivation origin going value_spec table), need flag supplemental ds_vars table add row supp table. single row per dataset/variable, following information: dataset: abbreviated name dataset. match name ds_spec variable: Variable name. match name ds_spec idvar: ID variable used supplemental variable. Can left missing needed qeval: Evaluator supplemental variable get information metacore objects build specification reader, please see vignettes. Schema diagram showing relationships metacore tables

title: A Centralized Metadata Object Focus on Clinical Trial Data Programming Workflows
text: alpha release package, ideas future improvements please add issue log.

text: metacore metacore object check

title: Optional checks to consistency of metadata — check_inconsistent_labels
text: variables consistent return message. inconsistencies return message dataset variables inconsistencies.

title: Optional checks to consistency of metadata — check_inconsistent_labels
code: ## EXAMPLE WITH DUPLICATES # Loads in a metacore obj called metacore load(metacore_example("pilot_ADaM.rda")) check_inconsistent_labels(metacore) #> Warning: Mismatch labels detected #> # A tibble: 4 × 4 #>   variable label                     n_vars ls_of_vars #>   <chr>    <chr>                      <int> <list>     #> 1 ANL01FL  Analysis Flag 01               1 <chr [1]>  #> 2 ANL01FL  Analysis Record Flag 01        1 <chr [1]>  #> 3 USUBJID  Unique Subject Identified      3 <chr [3]>  #> 4 USUBJID  Unique Subject Identifier      2 <chr [2]>   check_inconsistent_types(metacore) #> Warning: Mismatch types detected #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   variable type    n_vars ls_of_vars #>   <chr>    <chr>    <int> <list>     #> 1 AVAL     float        1 <chr [1]>  #> 2 AVAL     integer      2 <chr [2]>  #> 3 BASE     float        1 <chr [1]>  #> 4 BASE     integer      1 <chr [1]>  #> 5 CHG      float        1 <chr [1]>  #> 6 CHG      integer      1 <chr [1]>   ## EXAMPLE WITHOUT DUPLICATES # Loads in a metacore obj called metacore load(metacore_example("pilot_SDTM.rda")) check_inconsistent_labels(metacore) #> No mismatch labels detected  check_inconsistent_formats(metacore) #> No mismatch formats detected  check_inconsistent_types(metacore) #> No mismatch types detected

what: R6 Class wrapper to create your own metacore object — metacore
title: R6 Class wrapper to create your own metacore object — metacore
text: R6 Class wrapper create metacore object

title: R6 Class wrapper to create your own metacore object — metacore
code: metacore(   ds_spec = tibble(dataset = character(), structure = character(), label = character()),   ds_vars = tibble(dataset = character(), variable = character(), keep = NULL, mandatory     = logical(), key_seq = integer(), order = integer(), core = character(), supp_flag =     logical()),   var_spec = tibble(variable = character(), label = character(), length = integer(), type     = character(), common = character(), format = character()),   value_spec = tibble(dataset = character(), variable = character(), where = character(),     type = character(), sig_dig = integer(), code_id = character(), origin = character(),     derivation_id = integer()),   derivations = tibble(derivation_id = integer(), derivation = character()),   codelist = tibble(code_id = character(), name = character(), type = character(), codes     = list()),   supp = tibble(dataset = character(), variable = character(), idvar = character(), qeval     = character()),   quiet = deprecated(),   verbose = "message" )

title: R6 Class wrapper to create your own metacore object — metacore
text: ds_spec contains dataset study, labels ds_vars information variables dataset + plus dataset specific variable information var_spec variable information shared across datasets value_spec parameter specific information, data long specs wbc might difference hgb derivations contains derivation, allows different variables derivation codelist contains code/decode information supp contains idvar qeval information supplemental variables quiet Option quietly load , suppress warnings, errors. Expects either TRUE FALSE. Default behaviour FALSE. verbose character string specifying desired verbosity level. Must one : "message" (default) Messages warnings handled normally. "warn" Messages suppressed, warnings allowed. "collapse" Warnings collapsed single message indicating number suppressed warnings. "silent" messages warnings suppressed.

title: Specification document to metacore object — spec_to_metacore
text: path string file location quiet Option quietly load , suppress warnings, errors. Expects either TRUE FALSE. Default behaviour FALSE. where_sep_sheet Option tell separate sheet, like older p21 specs single sheet like newer p21 specs. verbose character string specifying desired verbosity level. Must one : "message" (default) Messages warnings handled normally. "warn" Messages suppressed, warnings allowed. "collapse" Warnings collapsed single message indicating number suppressed warnings. "silent" messages warnings suppressed.

title: Spec to codelist — spec_type_to_codelist
code: spec_type_to_codelist(   doc,   codelist_cols = c(code_id = "ID", name = "[N|n]ame", code = "^[C|c]ode|^[T|t]erm",     decode = "[D|d]ecode"),   permitted_val_cols = NULL,   dict_cols = c(code_id = "ID", name = "[N|n]ame", dictionary = "[D|d]ictionary", version     = "[V|v]ersion"),   sheets = NULL,   simplify = FALSE )

title: Spec to codelist — spec_type_to_codelist
text: doc Named list datasets @seealso read_all_sheets() exact format codelist_cols Named vector column names make codelist. column names can regular expressions flexibility. , names must follow given pattern permitted_val_cols Named vector column names make permitted value column names can regular expressions flexibility. optional, can left null permitted value sheet dict_cols Named vector column names make dictionary value column names can regular expressions flexibility. optional, can left null permitted value sheet sheets Optional, regular expressions sheets simplify Boolean value, true convert code/decode pairs equal permitted value list. True default

title: Spec to codelist — spec_type_to_codelist

title: Spec to derivation — spec_type_to_derivations

title: Verify that the Class Type of an object is DatasetMeta with warnings — verify_DatasetMeta
code: load(metacore_example("pilot_ADaM.rda")) adsl <- select_dataset(metacore, "ADSL", quiet = TRUE) if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ verify_DatasetMeta("DUMMY") # Expect error verify_DatasetMeta(metacore) # Expect error } # } verify_DatasetMeta(adsl) # Expect valid, i.e., return TRUE #> [1] TRUE
